James Caan , still best known for his role as Sonny Corleone in The Godfather, went on:`` I'd be willing to put up anything of personal value that the court would accept for bail. I would not hesitate a moment to fly in and be present if the court should so request. James Caan 's offer turned out to be one the presiding magistrate, Cheryl Pollak , found it easy to refuse. Mike Pence , R-Ind., who is considering either a gubernatorial run or a White House bid, href="http://www.youtube.com/user/PBSNewsHour#p/u/2/bTebEafVeuY"> praised the Barack Obama 's nod toward American exceptionalism. The Barack Obama reflected on the uniqueness of America. He remembered our soldiers, he remembered where the strength of this nation was, Mike Pence said, before adding that he was disappointed that the Barack Obama appeared to be`` committed to more spending and more government and more of the same of what the American people rejected on Election Day last fall.
